notes.text:
This update for openexr fixes the following issues:

- Fixed CVE-2021-3605 [bsc#1187395]: Heap buffer overflow in the rleUncompress function
- Fixed CVE-2021-3598 [bsc#1187310]: Heap buffer overflow in Imf_3_1:CharPtrIO:readChars
notes.title: Description of the patch

notes.text: There's a flaw in OpenEXR's ImfDeepScanLineInputFile functionality in versions prior to 3.0.5. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to an application linked with OpenEXR could cause an out-of-bounds read. The greatest risk from this flaw is to application availability.

notes.text: There's a flaw in OpenEXR's rleUncompress functionality in versions prior to 3.0.5. An attacker who is able to submit a crafted file to an application linked with OpenEXR could cause an out-of-bounds read. The greatest risk from this flaw is to application availability.
